version_description: Have a special code to get more love? Enter it in the "safe" on the settings screen.

We've added new ways to earn hearts for free! Bedroom update coming next week!!!

The long awaited bedroom scene is finally open! There are more than a 100 new decorations and pieces of furniture to go with it, as well as a new day/night system! Make sure to drop in at different times of day to discover special surprises!

We've added diverse new skin tones so everyone can pick a character that better represents them!

The long awaited bedroom scene is finally open! There are more than a 100 new decorations and pieces of furniture to go with it, as well as a new day/night system! Make sure to drop in at different times of day to discover special surprises!

We've added diverse new skin tones so everyone can pick a character that better represents them!
We've added more ways to earn love for free! Bedroom update coming next week. Stay tuned!

A Message from Hedwig
Watch the full message to receive the love from Hedwig.

The bathroom scene has been opened! There are more than a hundred new furnitures and decorations witch can help you create different styles of bathrooms for your characters! And also the room renovation function will be arrived recently, so keep looking forward!

The bathroom scene has been opened! There are more than a hundred new furnitures and decorations witch can help you create different styles of bathrooms for your characters! And also the room renovation function will be arrived recently, so keep looking forward!
Now you can renovate your rooms to different styles! Choose your favorite wall color and floor to create brand new rooms!

Various bug fixes and updates. New features coming soon!

When you have the perfect adorable life, it's time to start thinking about sustainability: Cooking the delicious meals you prepare for yourself and your partner... even growing your own ingredients. It's all possible now in the new Kitchen and Farm rooms! Explore new areas of your Adorable Home that let you cook a selection of new meals, grow your crops, tend to your animals and live many new adorable moments!

This is a very special 1-year anniversary update! Check in on January 9th for a special surprise! We've also added new items in the lounge and garden and Lunar New Year decorations for the upcoming holiday season.

This is a very special 1-year anniversary update! Check in on January 9th for a special surprise! We've also added new items in the lounge and garden and Lunar New Year decorations for the upcoming holiday season.

This is a very special 1-year anniversary update! Check in on January 9th for a special surprise! We've also added new items in the lounge and garden and Lunar New Year decorations for the upcoming holiday season.

Smell the rejuvenating fragrance of blooming flowers in the air as Adorable Home springs back to your life with a seasonal update! Just as the seeds of love flowered and blossomed into a beautiful relationship that led your Adorable Home, we celebrate the coming of the Spring with new Azalea, Magnolia and Cherry Blossom furniture sets!

Ton of other bug fixes and improvements as well. Tired of your furniture vanishing? Us too!
